price: Cyangwa bafite indi mana itari Allah? Ubutagatifu ni ubwa Allah kandi nta ho ahuriye n’ibyo bamubangikanya na byo.
arabic: أَمۡ لَهُمۡ إِلَٰهٌ غَيۡرُ ٱللَّهِۚ سُبۡحَٰنَ ٱللَّهِ عَمَّا يُشۡرِكُونَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: am lahum ilāhun ghayru al-lahi sub'ḥāna al-lahi ʿammā yush'rikūna
